findings.title: Exposed Database Credentials
findings.description: Credentials for the production database were found in a public GitHub repository.
findings.recommendation: Rotate credentials immediately and audit access logs.

findings.title: Admin Portal without MFA
findings.description: The administrative portal at admin.acme.com does not enforce Multi-Factor Authentication.
findings.recommendation: Enforce MFA for all admin accounts.

findings.title: Outdated SSL Certificate
findings.description: The SSL certificate for dev.acme.com expires in 2 days.
